description:
Make ski history in this legendary binding. Dynafit’s Speed Turn is an update of the TLT Speed model. This enlightened engineering has made it a favourite of fast ski tourers and mountaineers for over 2 decades. A new toe piece frame, forged aluminum and stainless-steel body, and improved mounting pattern modernize this classic.

  • Made of forged aluminum, high tech synthetic and stainless steel
  • Forged aluminum toe piece frame with Ice Breaker Pins
  • Adjustable length +/- 12.5mm
  • Torx screws for better attachment to the ski
  • Optimized mounting pattern
name: Dynafit Speed Turn Bindings
